casename: Shamsul bin Abdullah v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Khor Wee Siong (Khor Thiam Beng & Partners) for the appellant; Jaswant Singh (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Courts and Jurisdiction/Appeals/Trial judge's findings of fact/Standard of trial judge's scrutiny of evidence and witnesses' demeanour/Whether and when appellate court can intervene
